comments: She\'s funny, but on topic, and like to get the class discussing things. This was her first time teaching this class and she did a really good job, it was easy enough as long as you studied. She really wanted you to read the book, but I was able to get good grades without them from her lectures

One of the nicest teachers I have ever had. Really helpful and willing to answer your questions. The material isn\'t to hard. She actually teaches and doesn\'t just read from her slides. I highly recommend her if you have to take this class. She prepares you for the tests. Give lots of optional homework. Do it and understand it you\'ll get an A.
